artist: Artist: Auguste Louis Lepère; Editor: A. Desmoulins
description: people at edge of water at left; two figures on bridge at center; other figures on steep arch above bridge; buildings and tall smokestack in background center
portfolio: From Le Long de la Seine et des Boulevards
provenance: [Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, until 1998; set of 20 plates with frontispiece sold in May for AOOO to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1998-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in black ink: [A Lepère]; LLC in the plate, in black: [A. LEPERE]
title: The Lock of the Canal Saint-Martin, from "Along the Seine and the Boulevards"
